unnormalised: I remember when I was struggling after my IIT entrance prep... felt so lost. My friend suggested a mental health app. Honestly, I was skeptical! But, slowly, slowly, it helped. Like Geet's "life is a race" philosophy in *3 Idiots*, I realized I needed to slow down. Now, I use it for 15 mins before my yoga, helps center me more than just chanting 'Om' ever did!
normalised: I remember when I was struggling after my I I T entrance prep... felt so lost. My friend suggested a mental health app. Honestly, I was skeptical! But, slowly, slowly, it helped. Like Geet's "life is a race" philosophy in three Idiots, I realized I needed to slow down. Now, I use it for fifteen minutes before my yoga, helps center me more than just chanting 'Om' ever did!
